aboutSection.title: Your Trusted Partner for Importing from China
aboutSection.p1: Founded on the principles of trust and efficiency, Global Trading China is your sourcing agent in China. We are your eyes and ears on the ground, dedicated to simplifying the complexities of import-export.
aboutSection.p2: Our mission is to connect businesses worldwide to China's vast opportunities, offering local expertise, rigorous quality control, and transparent communication at every step of your purchase.

processSection.title: Our A-to-Z Sourcing Process
processSection.subtitle: A transparent and efficient journey, from product search to delivery.

step2.title: Sourcing & Quote

step4.title: Import-Export Logistics

hero.title: Our Mission: To Simplify and Secure Your Purchases in China
hero.subtitle: We are your dedicated sourcing partner, turning the opportunities of the Chinese market into success for your business.

aboutUs.title: Who Are We?
aboutUs.p1: Global Trading China was born from the conviction that access to the vast and complex Chinese market should be simple and secure for any company. Founded by international trade experts with years of on-the-ground experience, our company serves as a bridge between the ambitions of global entrepreneurs and China's incredible production potential.
aboutUs.p2: We are not just intermediaries. We are an extension of your team, your sourcing agent in China. Our mission is to defend your interests, guarantee the quality of your products through rigorous audits and controls, and optimize your supply chain for sustainable growth.

value1.title: Partnership
value1.description: We build long-term relationships based on trust and transparency for all your import projects.

value2.title: Rigor
value2.description: Every step, from sourcing to quality control, is conducted with the utmost rigor to ensure your satisfaction.

value3.title: Local Expertise
value3.description: Our on-the-ground presence in China is your best asset for navigating the market, finding the right suppliers, and negotiating effectively.

advantages.title: Why Work With a Sourcing Agent?
advantages.subtitle: Discover the key benefits that make us your ideal partner for your purchases in China.

advantage1.title: Single Point of Contact
advantage1.description: Simplify your import operations. We centralize communication and manage all stakeholders for you, from suppliers to freight forwarders.

advantage2.title: Risk Mitigation
advantage2.description: We protect your investments through AQL quality controls, factory audits, and secure payment management.

advantage3.title: On-the-Ground Presence
advantage3.description: Our team in China overcomes the language barrier, understands the local business culture, and responds in real-time to any production issues.

productSectors.title: Our Sourcing Sectors
productSectors.subtitle: Our procurement expertise covers a wide range of industries, allowing us to meet diverse and specific needs.

hero.title: Strategic Sourcing and Purchasing in China
hero.subtitle: From identifying the ideal supplier to negotiating the best terms, we are your expert agent on the ground.

approach.title: Our Sourcing Approach in China
approach.subtitle: We turn the complexity of the Chinese supplier market into a clear and secure opportunity for your business.

feature1.title: Strategic Supplier Identification
feature1.description: We go beyond a simple search. We identify manufacturing partners who align with your long-term goals, assessing not only their current production capacity but also their potential for innovation and growth.

feature2.title: In-depth Factory Verification and Audits
feature2.description: Our on-site factory audits are exhaustive. We check licenses, certifications (ISO, BSCI, etc.), financial stability, and working conditions to ensure you have a reliable and ethical partner.

feature3.title: Expert Negotiation
feature3.description: With our experience and local connections, we negotiate not only the best prices but also favorable payment terms, optimized production timelines, and strict quality clauses to protect your interests.

feature4.title: Efficient Sample Management
feature4.description: We coordinate the development, production, and rapid shipment of samples. We ensure that prototypes and pre-production samples exactly match your specifications before launching mass production.

partnerships.title: Our Sourcing Expertise by Sector
partnerships.subtitle: Our know-how extends to many industries. Here are some concrete examples of our partnerships.

partner1.title: Textile & Apparel
partner1.description: We collaborate with factories specializing in apparel, from ready-to-wear to high fashion, ensuring quality control of fabrics and finishes.

partner2.title: Electronics & High-Tech
partner2.description: Sourcing components and assembling finished products require extreme rigor. We ensure compliance with standards (CE, RoHS) and manage testing.

partner3.title: Furniture & Decoration
partner3.description: We identify artisans and factories capable of mass production while maintaining a high level of finish. The logistics for these bulky items is one of our strengths.

partner4.title: Toys & Nursery
partner4.description: Safety is the priority. We select factories that comply with international standards (EN71, ASTM) and inspect for non-toxic materials.

cta.title: Ready to find the perfect Chinese supplier?
cta.subtitle: Contact us today to discuss your sourcing needs. Our team is ready to help you navigate the Chinese manufacturing landscape with confidence.

hero.title: Flawless Trading and International Logistics
hero.subtitle: From the factory to your door, we manage every detail of your import-export operations from China for total peace of mind.

supplyChain.title: Mastery of Your Supply Chain
supplyChain.subtitle: We transform the challenges of import logistics into a simple, transparent, and efficient process.

feature1.title: Proactive Order Management
feature1.description: We act as your local purchasing office. We ensure daily production monitoring, anticipate delays, and communicate transparently to meet deadlines.

feature2.title: Multi-Stage Quality Control (AQL)
feature2.description: Our quality control process is uncompromising. We conduct inspections on raw materials, during production, and on finished products according to the AQL standards you define.

feature3.title: Optimized International Logistics
feature3.description: We select the best freight options (air, sea, rail) and handle all customs formalities (export from China, import to your country) for a smooth delivery.

feature4.title: Intelligent Consolidation
feature4.description: Group orders from multiple Chinese suppliers into a single shipment to drastically reduce your transport costs. We manage collection, warehousing, and loading.

steps.title: Production Confirmation and Follow-up
steps.description: Proactive monitoring of manufacturing at your supplier.

steps.title: Collection & Consolidation
steps.description: Grouping your goods in our warehouse in Yiwu.

steps.title: Final Quality Inspection
steps.description: Detailed inspection with photo/video report before balance payment.

steps.title: Freight Booking
steps.description: Selection and booking of the optimal carrier (sea, air, rail).

steps.title: Export Customs Clearance in China
steps.description: Management of all documentation for exiting the territory.

steps.title: International Shipping
steps.description: Loading and sending your cargo to its final destination.

steps.title: Tracking & Delivery
steps.description: Real-time tracking of your goods to your door.

shippingOptions.title: Timelines & Costs: Which transport solution to choose?
shippingOptions.subtitle: Every shipment from China is unique. We help you choose the best transport method.

options.title: Sea Freight
options.bestFor: Ideal for large, non-urgent orders. The most cost-effective for large volumes.

options.title: Air Freight
options.bestFor: For urgent, high-value, or low-volume orders. The fastest solution.

options.title: Rail Freight (to Europe)
options.bestFor: Excellent compromise between the cost of sea freight and the speed of air freight.

qualityCommitment.title: Our Quality Commitment: Zero Compromise
qualityCommitment.subtitle: Quality is not an option, it's our promise. Discover how we protect your investment and reputation.

item1.title: Custom Inspection
item1.description: We develop a specific inspection checklist for your product, covering aesthetics, dimensions, functionality, packaging, and labeling.

item2.title: AQL Standards
item2.description: We apply international AQL (Acceptable Quality Limit) standards for an objective and statistical assessment of your production batches' quality.

item3.title: Detailed Reports
item3.description: You receive a complete report with photos and videos after each inspection, giving you a clear view before the goods leave the factory.

customs.title: Customs & Documentation: Navigating Complexity
customs.subtitle: We handle the paperwork so you don't have to. Correct documentation is key to a smooth shipment.

export.title: Export Documentation
items: Bill of Lading or Air Waybill

compliance.title: Compliance & Certifications
items: Verification of standard compliance (CE, RoHS, FCC, etc.)
Assistance in obtaining required test certificates
Management of export licenses for regulated products

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions about Importing from China
faq.subtitle: Some answers to the questions we receive most often.

questions.question: What is AQL and how do you define it?
questions.answer: AQL (Acceptable Quality Limit) is a statistical standard to determine the sample size to inspect and the number of acceptable defects. We work with you to define an AQL level (e.g., 2.5) suited to your product and quality requirements.

questions.question: What are Incoterms and why are they important?
questions.answer: Incoterms (EXW, FOB, CIF, DDP, etc.) are international rules that define the responsibilities of the buyer and seller regarding the delivery of goods. A wise choice is crucial for controlling costs and risks. We advise you on the most suitable Incoterm for your strategy.

questions.question: How do you handle production delays or quality issues?
questions.answer: Thanks to our proactive monitoring, we often anticipate problems. If a delay or defect is detected, we inform you immediately with possible solutions: negotiating with the factory, finding alternatives, or a recovery plan. Our role is to defend your interests and minimize the impact on your business.

cta.title: Optimize your supply chain now.
cta.subtitle: Let us handle the complexity of logistics and international trade so you can focus on your growth.

hero.title: Integrated E-commerce Solutions
hero.subtitle: Your one-stop partner to launch and grow your online store with products sourced from China.

accelerator.title: Your E-commerce Accelerator
accelerator.subtitle: We provide the infrastructure and expertise to turn your idea into a successful e-commerce business.

feature1.title: Winning Product Sourcing
feature1.description: Through our market analysis and on-the-ground presence, we identify trending products with high margin potential for platforms like Amazon FBA, Shopify, and European marketplaces.

feature2.title: Custom Branding and Packaging
feature2.description: Differentiate yourself from the competition. We help you create a strong brand, from logo design to custom packaging (boxes, labels, user manuals) that will delight your customers.

feature3.title: Compliant FBA & 3PL Preparation
feature3.description: Avoid costly rejections and delays. We prepare your products according to the strictest specifications of Amazon (FNSKU labeling, polybags, master cartons) or any other third-party logistics (3PL) service.

feature4.title: Reliable Dropshipping and Fulfillment
feature4.description: Get started without investing in massive stock. We offer dropshipping solutions where we store your products and ship them directly to your end customers, with tracking options and custom packaging.

cta.title: Ready to launch your next bestseller?
cta.subtitle: Let's discuss your e-commerce project. Whether you're an experienced Amazon seller or a Shopify beginner, we have the solution for you.

hero.title: Custom Services and Strategic Consulting
hero.subtitle: Flexible solutions designed to meet your unique business challenges in China.

extraMile.title: Your Partner for the Extra Mile
extraMile.subtitle: When your needs go beyond the standard, our expertise and flexibility make all the difference.

feature1.title: Custom Product Development (OEM/ODM)
feature1.description: Have an innovative idea? We turn it into reality. We support you from 3D design and prototyping to sourcing specific materials and setting up a dedicated production line.

feature2.title: Trade Fair Assistance
feature2.description: Optimize your visit to China. We accompany you to major fairs like the Canton Fair, providing translation, initial contact, pre-selection of relevant booths, and post-fair follow-up.

feature3.title: Purchasing Strategy Consulting
feature3.description: Beyond operations, we provide a strategic vision. We analyze your supply chain, identify friction points, and propose solutions to reduce costs, minimize risks, and improve efficiency.

feature4.title: Complex Project Management
feature4.description: For projects requiring coordination of multiple suppliers, advanced technical skills, or a particularly demanding set of specifications, we act as your single project manager in China, ensuring cohesion and project success.

service1.title: From Concept to Finished Product: Our OEM/ODM Process
service1.description: We transform your vision into a marketable product through a structured and collaborative process.
points: Analysis of specifications and feasibility study.
3D design, modeling, and prototype creation.
Sourcing of specific materials and components.
Selection of the most suitable factory and production setup.
Manufacturing follow-up and quality control at every stage.

service2.title: Maximize Your Impact at Trade Shows
service2.description: Make your visit to Chinese trade shows a profitable investment with tailored support.
points: Upstream preparation: defining objectives, pre-selecting exhibitors.
On-site support: technical translation, negotiation assistance.
Logistics: hotel booking, transport, schedule organization.
Post-show follow-up: centralizing contacts, offer tracking, sample management.
Organization of factory visits on the sidelines of the show.

service3.title: A Smart Purchasing Strategy for Sustainable Growth
service3.description: We optimize your supply chain to make it more resilient, efficient, and cost-effective.
points: Complete audit of your current supply chain.
Risk analysis (geopolitical, logistical, supplier).
Supplier panel rationalization and identification of alternative sources.
Implementation of Key Performance Indicators (KPIs).
Advice on Incoterms and customs clearance strategies.

service4.title: Complex Project Management: Your Orchestra Conductor in China
service4.description: We ensure perfect synchronization of all stakeholders to successfully complete your most ambitious projects.
points: Single point of contact for all suppliers and stakeholders.
Development of a detailed schedule and rigorous milestone tracking.
Management of technical documentation and regulatory compliance.
Coordination of logistics flows between different production sites.
Regular and transparent reporting on project progress.

cta.title: Have a project that's out of the ordinary?
cta.subtitle: We love a challenge. Contact us to discuss your specific needs, and together we will build a custom solution.

hero.title: Strategic Trade Hubs for Sourcing in China
hero.subtitle: Discover the key cities at the heart of global trade and how we give you privileged access to them.

guangzhou.name: Guangzhou (Canton)
guangzhou.subtitle: The World Capital of Traditional Trade
guangzhou.description: A historic trading port, Guangzhou is an essential hub, famous for the Canton Fair. The city excels in sourcing textiles, clothing, leather goods, and consumer electronics.

shenzhen.name: Shenzhen
shenzhen.subtitle: The Silicon Valley of Hardware
shenzhen.description: Neighboring Hong Kong, Shenzhen is the global epicenter of electronics manufacturing, from components to finished products. If your project involves high-tech, gadgets, or startups, Shenzhen is the must-go sourcing city.

yiwu.name: Yiwu
yiwu.subtitle: The World's Largest Wholesale Market
yiwu.description: Yiwu is home to the immense 'International Trade City'. It is a paradise for sourcing small items, consumer goods, toys, and jewelry. Ideal for buyers looking to order small quantities (low MOQs) across a huge variety of products.

section3.title: Intellectual Property

section4.title: Liability
section4.p1: The information contained on this site is as accurate as possible and the site is periodically updated, but may contain inaccuracies, omissions or gaps. If you notice a gap, error or what appears to be a malfunction, please report it by email, describing the problem as precisely as possible.

privacyPolicyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicyPage.introduction: This privacy policy describes how your personal information is collected, used, and shared when you visit or make a purchase from our site.

section1.title: Personal Information We Collect
section1.p1: When you visit the site, we automatically collect certain information about your device. Additionally, when you attempt to contact us through the site, we collect certain information from you, including:

section2.title: How Do We Use Your Personal Information?
section2.p1: We use the information we collect generally to communicate with you and screen our orders for potential risk or fraud.

section3.title: Sharing Your Personal Information
section3.p1: We do not share your Personal Information with third parties except to comply with applicable laws and regulations, to respond to a subpoena, search warrant or other lawful request for information we receive, or to otherwise protect our rights.

section4.title: Your Rights
section4.p1: If you are a European resident, you have the right to access personal information we hold about you and to ask that your personal information be corrected, updated, or deleted. If you would like to exercise this right, please contact us.

termsOfServicePage.title: Terms of Service
termsOfServicePage.introduction: These Terms of Service govern your use of our website and the services we offer. By accessing or using the service, you agree to be bound by these Terms.

section1.title: Services
section1.p1: We provide sourcing, trading, and e-commerce services from China. The specifics of these services will be defined in a separate agreement or quote provided to you.

section2.title: User Obligations
section2.p1: You agree to use our site and services for lawful purposes only. You must provide accurate and complete information when requesting a quote or using our services.

section3.title: Limitation of Liability
section3.p1: Our liability shall be limited to the amount paid by you for the services. We are not responsible for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.

section4.title: Governing Law
section4.p1: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the People's Republic of China, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
